title: Add tmux-compatible CLI wrapper (fugue-compat)
description: Create a CLI binary that accepts tmux command syntax and translates to fugue MCP calls, enabling drop-in replacement for existing tools. Gas Town shells out to tmux via exec.Command("tmux", args...) in internal/tmux/tmux.go:35. A compatibility layer allows one-line swap for incremental migration with no changes needed in Gas Town codebase for Phase 1.
user_impact: Enables incremental adoption of fugue by existing tools that currently shell out to tmux, without requiring code changes in those tools
